title: How to Throw an Indoor Luau

steps.headline: Choose the location, date, and time of your party most convenient for everyone.
Have your luau music playing while guests arrive!
Place your tablecloths on the tables (If you have more than one color, make sure you space them out evenly)
On every other table, place the mini-buckets on the center of the table.
steps.description: Fill the mini-buckets with sand, and then place your mini-tiki torches in them. Sprinkle a few small seashells in the buckets.

steps.headline: On every other table, place a round, glass bowl in the center of the table.
steps.description: Fill the bowl with water and add a few drops of blue food coloring to create an ocean look. Place a couple or three of the luau rubber duckies in the bowls to float around.

steps.headline: If you have any confetti, sprinkle it out along the middle of the tables.
Use the blue, plastic, kiddy pool to put your sodas in.
steps.description: Fill it with ice and keep your drinks cold. Place one or two of the inflatable palm trees beside it.

steps.headline: Create a "beach party" corner... Place some lawn chairs, straw mats, straw umbrellas, and an inflatable tree or two somewhere at your party.
Use a tub to put your leis in... make sure you place these close to the door so that your guests can grab one when they arrive.

text: Choose the location, date, and time of your party most convenient for everyone.  Have your luau music playing while guests arrive!  Place your tablecloths on the tables (If you have more than one color, make sure you space them out evenly)  On every other table, place the mini-buckets on the center of the table. Fill the mini-buckets with sand, and then place your mini-tiki torches in them. Sprinkle a few small seashells in the buckets. On every other table, place a round, glass bowl in the center of the table. Fill the bowl with water and add a few drops of blue food coloring to create an ocean look. Place a couple or three of the luau rubber duckies in the bowls to float around. If you have any confetti, sprinkle it out along the middle of the tables.  Use the blue, plastic, kiddy pool to put your sodas in. Fill it with ice and keep your drinks cold. Place one or two of the inflatable palm trees beside it. Create a "beach party" corner... Place some lawn chairs, straw mats, straw umbrellas, and an inflatable tree or two somewhere at your party.  Use a tub to put your leis in... make sure you place these close to the door so that your guests can grab one when they arrive.
